price: عذاب همداسې وي او د آخرت عذاب له دې هم لا ډېر لوى دی، خو كاشكې هغوى پوهېدلاى.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡعَذَابُۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika al-ʿadhābu walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati akbaru law kānū yaʿlamūna
